projects.project_descr: CONSERVING MOUNTAIN BIODIVERSITY IN LESOTHO

The project provides a response to address the issues and priorities related to poverty-environment nexus through better conservation and protection of country’s natural resources and improved environmental management.
Strengthening National Capacities to Monitor Poverty Reduction Interventions and Progress towards the acheivement of the MDGS

The project aims at reducing Lesotho’s energy related CO2 emissions by promoting renewable and low Green House Gases (GHG) technologies as a substitute for fossil fuels utilised in rural areas of the country.
projects.project_title: Renewable Energy Rural Electrification in Lesotho

projects.project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to strengthen national capacity under the integrated Framework for Trade Related Technical Assistance (IF)
projects.project_title: Integrated Approach to Trade Enhancement & Wealth Creati

projects.project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to create an enabling national environment for the promotion of youth employment and enterprise development to support poverty reduction initiatives in Lesotho.
projects.project_title: Promotion of Youth Employment towards Poverty Reduction

projects.project_descr: The objective of this project is to enable the government to have access to technical advisory services, knowledge, expertise, experience and information to support policy development.

A project is for capacity assessment of the Joint UN Team on AIDS, to support effective development and implementation of the Essential Services package (ESP) on HIV and AIDS for 128 Community Councils in 10 districts.
The project aims to monitor the MDGs and advocate for their achievement through policy measures, multi-sectoral strategies and development of appropriate interventions.
This project focuses on strengthening the disaster management system in Lesotho and effective management of the impact of disaster risks within the context of sustainable development.
projects.project_title: Strengthning Capacity Disaster Risk Reduction in Lesotho

projects.project_descr: PIMS 3044 - Capacity Building and Knowledge Management for Sustainable Land Management in Lesotho

Consolidation of Democracy and Good Governance in Lesotho (CDGG) is a four-year programme jointly funded by the governments of Ireland and the United Kingdom, with United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) designed to build on the existing multi-donor.
projects.project_title: Consolidation of Democracy & Good Governance in Lesotho

projects.project_descr: The project purpose is to support the establishment of “one-stop” outreach centre(s) for victims of gender-based violence.
projects.project_title: Measures to counteract Violence Against Women

projects.project_descr: Strengthened democratic institutions, civil society organisations, transformed leadership and, increased civil liberties and human rights.

The overall objective of the project is to build a network for MSM, gays and lesbians in Lesotho as the entry point for the delivery of targeted HIV-related services. It also seeks to undertake a size estimation and rapid assessment and response on MSM.
This project is designed to provide critical bridging support to the Distance Teacher Education Programme (DTEP) through the provision of qualified UNV resources.
projects.project_title: Support to Distance Teacher Education Programme

projects.project_descr: Joint Programme Outcome is to improved and expanded equitable access to quality basic health services for all through the deployment of medical personnel as volunteers.
Governance institutions strengthened, ensuring gender equality, public service delivery and human rights for all by 2012.
This programme provides a mechanism for young graduates from the university and those graduating at third-level technical training to access volunteer opportunities in various workspaces.
Community Leadership and Capacity Enhancement

The proposed project will support the development of financially sustainable and innovative public private partnerships (PPPs) for basic service delivery, in particular the delivery of solid waste management services the city of Maseru in Lesotho.
Supporting Integrated and Comprehensive Approaches to Climate Change Adaptation in Lesotho
Strengthening Capacity for Research on Lesotho's Royal History.

Strengthened and pro-active engagement of political parties to ensure progress for implementation  of the MDGs and Capacity building of and advocacy with the media and youth groups for more effective reporting on and direct promotion of the MDGs
projects.project_title: Engaging Political Parties, Media & Youth achieving MDGs

projects.project_descr: This project provides two pronged support - 1) economic development activities for women in 4 target districts and 2) UN support to the national development plan Special efforts will be made towards promoting employment opportunities for women.
Improved and increased access to financial services by low segment of the population including low income population, youth, women and other vulnerable groups through.
projects.project_title: Support for Financial Inclusion in Lesotho (SUFIL)

projects.project_descr: Building on previous collaborative work of the Government of Lesotho and UNDP/UNCDF in the area of decentralization, this project aims to accelerate progress and deepen decentralization in Lesotho.
